headline.main: FULL WAR PROGRAM EFFECTIVE IN STATE; Lehman Meets With New Council as Emergency Defense Act Grants Powers HASKELL HINTED AS AIDE He May Succeed O'Ryan -Bills Signed to Implement Civilian Protection

lead_paragraph: ALBANY, May 1 -- New York State went on a full wartime basis today. A tighter grip is given to the State on defense and protection activities machinery is set up to meet disaster caused by enemy action and penalties become effective for blackout violations.
abstract: war emergency act goes into effect; Lehman meets with new War Council; signs 8 other measures; Maj Gen Haskell may succeed O'Ryan as Civilian Protection Dir

byline.original: By WARREN MOSCOWSpecial to THE NEW YORK TIMES
